skills.name: Invigorating Strike
skills.desc: ifRogueComboPointsEnabled()<text class='c_label'>Generate Combo Point:</text> <text class='c_resource'>1</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>50%</text></br>Melee attack an enemy, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.25 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and increasing Energy Regeneration by <text class='c_number'>20%</text> for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.

skills.name: Flurry
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Energy Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>25</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>10%</text></br>Unleash a flurry of stabs and slashes, striking enemies in front of you <text class='c_number'>4</text> times and dealing a total of <text class='c_number'>[0.6 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage to each.ifRogueComboPointsEnabled()</br></br><text class='c_important'>Combo Points</text> increase damage and grant an Attack Speed bonus for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds.</br><li> <text class='c_label'>1 Point:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.6 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+0.25*1)</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[[0.15 * [1+ [SF_3* Floor(Resource_Cur#ComboPoints/3) * SF_4]]]*100]%</text> bonus</br><li> <text class='c_label'>2 Points:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.6 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+0.25*2)</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[2*[0.15 * [1+ [SF_3* Floor(Resource_Cur#ComboPoints/3) * SF_4]]]*100]%</text> bonus</br><li> <text class='c_label'>3 Points:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.6 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+0.25*3)</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[3*[0.15 * [1+ [SF_3* Floor(Resource_Cur#ComboPoints/3) * SF_4]]]*100*42]%</text> bonus

skills.name: Dark Shroud
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>20</text> seconds</br>Surround yourself with up to <text class='c_number'>5</text> protective shadows. Gain <text class='c_number'>[[Max(0.08, 0.076 + (.004*sLevel))] * 100]%</text> Damage Reduction per active shadow. Each time you take direct damage, that damage is reduced and a shadow is consumed.

skills.name: Dash
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>2</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[12 * ((cdr[sLevel])]</text> seconds </br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Dash forward and slash enemies for <text class='c_number'>[0.32 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))*[1+0.15]]</text> damage.

equipment.name: Shortsword
base_affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +1% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites
